title: Verify Multi-language does not appear on PPV Detail Page during Live Linear Stream (Pre-Show)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Pay Per View Category row
custom_steps: WHEN we select the PPV Live Linear Stream
custom_expected:
THEN the PPV Show Page will open
AND the Show's title will appear 
AND the episode's metadata will appear beneath the Show title 
AND the Show's Air Time and Duration will appear
AND the Watch Live button will appear
AND the Watch from Beginning button will appear
AND the Add Episode button will appear
AND the Add Series button will appear
AND a Change Language button will NOT appear

title: Verify Multi-language does not appear on the Live Linear Stream (Pre-Show)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigate to the PPV Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate the PPV Live Linear Stream
AND we launch the PPV Live Linear Stream
AND the user brings up the Video Player
custom_expected: THEN there will not be any Multi-Language option.

title: Verify there is a Multi-Language Button on PPV Detail Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Pay Per View Category row
custom_steps: WHEN we select the live PPV pre-show
custom_expected:
THEN the PPV Show Page will open
AND the Show's title will appear 
AND the episode's metadata will appear beneath the Show title 
AND the Show's Air Time and Duration will appear
AND the Watch Live button will appear
AND the Watch from Beginning button will appear
AND the Add Episode button will appear
AND the Add Series button will appear
AND a Change Language button will appear

title: Verify all supported languages are listed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is logged in with an entitled account
custom_steps: WHEN User selects the Multi-Language option on PPV Detail page
custom_expected:
THEN the list of available languages should consist of the following 8 languages (when available)
English
Spanish
Brazilian Portuguese
German
Russian
Japanese
Hindi
Mandarin

title: Verify user is able to scroll up and down Preferred Languages list on Language menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is logged in with an entitled account
AND User has begun Live Linear
custom_steps:
WHEN User taps on Multi-Language option on video Player
AND taps Audio Language
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be able to scroll up and down through the language list

FOR ATV LEGACY:
Please mark this as N/A for ATV Legacy as it does NOT support in-player settings

title: Verify user can select a preferred language
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is logged in with an entitled account
AND User is on the PPV Detail Page
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects the Multi-Language option on the PPV Detail Page
AND selects Audio Language
custom_expected: THEN the user should be able to select a language in the list

title: Verify audio for selected language plays
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is logged in with an entitled account
AND User has begun Live PPV Stream
custom_steps: WHEN the User launches the PPV Live Stream
custom_expected: THEN the audio should be changed to the selected language

title: Verify Multi-language appears on Live PPV Stream
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is signed in with a entitled account
AND User is on WWE Network
custom_steps: WHEN User begins Live playback for a Live PPV Stream
custom_expected:
THEN Multi-Language Option appears on Video Player (Lower Right)

FOR ATV LEGACY:
Please mark this as N/A for ATV Legacy as it does NOT support in-player settings

title: Verify Multi-Language Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is logged in with an entitled account
AND User has begun Live playback
custom_steps: WHEN User selects Multi-Language option on video Player
custom_expected:
THEN the following options will appear:
Audio Language
Closed Captions
AND Playback remains playing

Please mark this as N/A for ATV Legacy as it does NOT support in-player settings

title: Scenario: User changes Multi-Language feed during playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is signed in with a entitled account
AND User is on WWE Network
AND User has begun Event Stream
custom_steps: WHEN User selects a different Multi-Language feed
custom_expected:
THEN the PPV asset restarts from the beginning of the selected language feed

title: Verify Closed Captions are always in English no matter what language is selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is logged in with an entitled account
AND User has begun Live Linear
custom_steps:
WHEN User taps on Multi-Language option on video Player
AND taps Audio Language
AND the selected audio language plays
AND User taps the CC button
custom_expected:
THEN the Closed Captions remain in English

FOR ATV LEGACY:
Please mark this as N/A for ATV Legacy as it does NOT support in-player settings

title: Verify selected preferred language is remembered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN WWE is installed
AND User is logged in with an entitled account
AND User has begun Live Linear
AND User has selected a language other than English
custom_steps:
WHEN User closes PPV Live asset
AND navigates through the app
AND reopens the PPV Live asset
custom_expected:
THEN the selected language should be remembered
AND audio should be previously selected language

FOR ATV LEGACY:
Please mark this as N/A for ATV Legacy as it does NOT support in-player settings
